body_html: We should definitely keep it around, but I think masked_scatter would be a better name. Masked copy should be an op that takes two tensors of matching sizes and only copies values in places that have 1 in a mask
body_text: We should definitely keep it around, but I think masked_scatter would be a better name. Masked copy should be an op that takes two tensors of matching sizes and only copies values in places that have 1 in a mask
body: We should definitely keep it around, but I think masked_scatter would be a better name. Masked copy should be an op that takes two tensors of matching sizes and only copies values in places that have 1 in a mask
